sourcesContent:
<template>
    <BaseModal :show="show" class="modal-mask" @close="$emit('close')">
        <MainDmd :plane0="getCurrentImage()" :plane1="getBlendImage()"></MainDmd>
    </BaseModal>
</template>

<script>
import BaseModal from './BaseModal.vue';
import MainDmd from '../../dmd/MainDmd.vue';
import store from "../../../stores/store.js";
import { useWpcEditStore } from '../../../stores/wpcEditStore.js'

const WpcEditStore = useWpcEditStore(store);

export default {
    name: 'SpriteModal',
    setup() {
    },
    props: {
        show: Boolean,
        index: Number,
        table: Number
    },
    methods: {
        getCurrentImage() {
            return WpcEditStore.getSpriteAt(0,this.index).image;
        },
        getBlendImage() {
            return WpcEditStore.getSpriteAt(0,this.index+1).image;
        }
    },
    components: { 
        BaseModal,
        MainDmd
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>


</style>
